https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/axj9DrtSXe3yxXogoeU0BL40nN5.jpg A volcanic eruption in Iceland sends a glacier towards North America, causing everything in it's path to freeze. A family man struggles to escape the onslaught of the coming ice age. 2012: Ice Age
